title: Bon Jovi - Sessions From The Vault (Disc 1) - 320kbps
description:
1. John Bongiovi & The Wild Ones - What You Want [Demo]
2. John Bongiovi & The Wild Ones - Runaway [Demo]
3. John Bongiovi & The Wild Ones - She Don&#039;t Know Me [Demo]
4. John Bongiovi & The Wild Ones - Shot Through The Heart [Demo]
5. John Bongiovi & The Wild Ones - Love Lies [Demo]
6. John Bongiovi - Heartbreak Eyes [Demo]
7. John Bongiovi - Hollywood Dreams [Demo]
8. John Bongiovi - Talkin&#039; In Your Sleep [Demo]
9. John Bongiovi - No Action [Demo]
10. John Bongiovi - Open Your Heart [Demo]
11. John Bongiovi - That Woman Is Dangerous [Demo]
12. John Bongiovi - Don&#039;t Do That To Me Anymore [Demo]
13. John Bongiovi - Same Old Lines [Demo]
14. John Bongiovi - More Than We Bargained For [Demo]
15. John Bongiovi - Head Over Heels [Demo]
16. John Bongiovi - Don&#039;t Keep Me Wondering [Demo]
17. John Bongiovi - Charlene [Demo]
18. John Bongiovi - Don&#039;t Leave Me Tonight [Demo]
19. John Bongiovi - Dorothea [Demo]

-Tracks 1-5 are unreleased &#039;John Bongiovi and the Wild Ones&#039; demos recorded to try to land a record deal in late 1982 - early 1983.

-Tracks 6-19 are unreleased John Bongiovi &#039;Power Station&#039; demos (some of these tracks were later rerecorded with studio musicians and released by Tony Bongiovi, Jon&#039;s Uncle. Jon sued and lost a fight to block the release, all of these are the original unreleased versions).
